name: Evil Developer's Lair
description:
You are an unfinished videogame character who only has 2 movement comands, (Move right and jump) You must invade the Evil Developer's Lair to retrieve your movement capabilities!

Project made for Ludum Dare 34 with the themes "Two Button Controls" and "Growing". As it was only made in 48 hour (minus some sleep) it is a short game. There are no sounds, and there may be bugs.

Thanks for playing, and have fun!
